name: Hydrating Face Cream

description: Brightens your complexion and reduces dark spots with concentrated Vitamin C.

description: A long-lasting matte lipstick in a vibrant rose red shade.

description: Add dramatic volume and length to your lashes with a single swipe.

description: Soothes and tones the skin, reducing redness and tightening pores.

description: Hydrates, evens skin tone, and protects against UV rays.
